Hillsboro.Aloha Farmhouse: The Aloha Farmhouse is a Craftsman-inspired residence located in Aloha, Oregon, United States, listed on the National Register of Historic Places. The one-story house was built in 1915, and architect Pietro Belluschi remodeled the building twice, first in 1944 and again in 1946. The Belluschis moved from the home in 1948 and sold the property.
